title: Kampai Street Wok
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Thai, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A kosher Asian fusion and sushi restaurant in the German Colony with many vegan choices. Half of the starters, soups, desserts, and all but three of the main dishes are either clearly designated as vegan, or can be made vegan by choosing the tofu or soy protein. Also has 8 clearly marked vegan sushi.
